nodes.text: Strength enhancing system was a type of armor enhancement available during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin. The system would increase the wearer's overall strength, and allowed him to easily carry heavier loads for longer periods of time. Several models of system were available, all costing about  5500; these included BioTech Industries's "Brute" strength enhancer, Atlas Corp's Myomer strength enhancer system and Industrial Automaton's Xr5 Power Assist.
